TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawingAttributes extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 指定 的外观

span.span: Specifies the appearance of a

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定设置，如颜色、宽度、透明度和触笔笔尖的形状 。Use the property to specify settings such as color, width, transparency, and the shape of the stylus tip for a . 使用 属性指定添加到中的笔画的绘制特性 。Use the property to specify the drawing attributes for the strokes added to an . 只有在 "经历更改" 后添加的笔划才会 显示更新后的属性。Only strokes that are added after the undergo change show the updated attributes. 中已存在的笔画的外观 不会改变。The appearance of the strokes that are already on the does not change. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类通常不在 XAML 中使用。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用两个 对象来模拟在同一上使用笔和荧光笔 。The following example demonstrates how to use two objects to simulate using a pen and a highlighter on the same . 该示例假设 XAML 文件中的根元素是一个被 调用的 `root` 。The example assumes the root element in the XAML file is a called `root`. 它还假设有一个被 调用的 `switchHighlighter` ，并且该 事件已连接到此示例中定义的事件处理程序。It also assumes that there is a called `switchHighlighter` and that the event is connected to the event handler defined in this example. summary.span: 将一个自定义属性添加到 对象中。

span.span: Adds a custom property to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可以将自定义属性添加到 对象。The method enables you to add custom properties to a object. 当你呈现自己的笔划并想要提供额外的信息时，这非常有用。This is useful when you render your own strokes and want to provide extra information. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从对象中添加和检索自定义属性 。The following example demonstrates how to add and retrieve a custom property from the object. 该示例添加一个属性，该属性指示 对象是笔还是荧光笔。The example adds a property that indicates whether the object is a pen or a highlighter. 事件处理程序中的代码在 `ChangeColors_Click` 使用对象的上为笔画呈现新的颜色 `inkDA` 。The code in the `ChangeColors_Click` event handler renders a new color for strokes on the that use the object, `inkDA`. 此示例假设有一个名为 的 `inkCanvas1` ，并且有两个 对象名为 `inkDA` ， `highlighterDA.`This example assumes that there is an named `inkCanvas1`, and that there are two objects named `inkDA`, and `highlighterDA.` [!code-csharp[DrawingAttributes#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingAttributes/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#5)] [!code-vb[DrawingAttributes#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingAttributes/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于绘制 的触笔的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the stylus used to draw the .

value.span: 表示用于绘制 的触笔高度的值。

span.span: The value that indicates the height of the stylus used to draw the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当呈现时，以下因素会影响的高度和宽度 ，而不会影响属性的值 。The following factors affect the height and width of a when it is rendered, but not the value of the property. - 绘制时应用于触笔的压力量 。The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the is drawn. - 属性的值。The value of the property. 如果将属性设置 为0与设备无关的像素 (dip) ，则将其更改为2个 dip。If you set the property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此属性通常不在 XAML 中使用。This property is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property. 该示例假设你的应用程序具有一个名为的 `inkCanvas1` 和两个 名为和的对象 `inkDA` `highlighterDA` 。The example assumes that your application has an called `inkCanvas1`, and two objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`. 有关完整的示例，请参阅 类概述。For the complete example, see the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.span: is .

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时， 为基类调用方法，以确保注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the method for the base class to ensure that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当呈现时，以下因素会影响的高度和宽度 ，而不会影响属性的值 。The following factors affect the height and width of a when it is rendered, but not the value of the property. - 绘制时应用于触笔的压力量 。The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the is drawn. - 属性的值。The value of the property. 如果将属性设置 为0与设备无关的像素 (dip) ，则将其更改为2个 dip。If you set the property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此属性通常不在 XAML 中使用。This property is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property. 该示例假设你的应用程序具有一个名为的 `inkCanvas1` 和两个 名为和的对象 `inkDA` `highlighterDA` 。The example assumes that your application has an called `inkCanvas1`, and two objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`. 有关完整的示例，请参阅 类概述。For the complete example, see the class overview.
